title: Why Does Hisoka Morow Love Power So Much?
excerpt: In any community, especially our own at STEM High School for Boys â€“ 6th of October, leadership is a powerful force. This philosophical exploration delves into the complex psychology behind leadership aspirations, examining how personal insecurities, societal expectations, and the desire for validation can transform genuine leadership into a performative pursuit of power.
author: Yaseen Mohamed-Abdelal
